history.proof: intros a b. unfold Rmin, Rmax. destruct (Rle_dec (-a) (-b)) as [Hle | Hgt]; destruct (Rle_dec a b) as [Hle' | Hgt']. - hauto lq: on use: Ropp_le_cancel, Rle_lt_trans, Rlt_irrefl unfold: Rle. - qsimpl time: 2 use: Rle. - qsimpl time: 2 use: Rle. - sfirstorder use: Rnot_le_lt, Ropp_le_contravar unfold: Rle.

ctx: destruct (Rle_dec (-a) (-b)) as [Hle | Hgt]; destruct (Rle_dec a b) as [Hle' | Hgt'].
exceptions.exn: In environment a, b : R Hle : - a <= - b Hle' : a <= b Unable to unify "- a" with "- b".

ctx: destruct (Rle_dec (-a) (-b)) as [Hle | Hgt]; destruct (Rle_dec a b) as [Hle' | Hgt'].
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: destruct (Rle_dec (-a) (-b)) as [Hle | Hgt]; destruct (Rle_dec a b) as [Hle' | Hgt'].
destruct (Rle_dec (-a) (-b)) as [Hle | Hgt]; destruct (Rle_dec a b) as [Hle' | Hgt'].
exceptions.exn: No such goal. Focus next goal with bullet -.

ctx: destruct (Rle_dec (-a) (-b)) as [Hle | Hgt]; destruct (Rle_dec a b) as [Hle' | Hgt'].
destruct (Rle_dec (-a) (-b)) as [Hle | Hgt]; destruct (Rle_dec a b) as [Hle' | Hgt'].
exceptions.exn: No such goal. Focus next goal with bullet -.

ctx: destruct (Rle_dec (-a) (-b)) as [Hle | Hgt]; destruct (Rle_dec a b) as [Hle' | Hgt'].
exceptions.exn: In environment a, b : R Hgt : ~ - a <= - b Hgt' : ~ a <= b Unable to unify "- b" with "- a".

original: intros a b. unfold Rmin, Rmax. destruct (Rle_dec (-a) (-b)) as [Hle | Hgt]; destruct (Rle_dec a b) as [Hle' | Hgt']. - simpl. reflexivity. - unfold Rle in Hgt. exfalso. lra. - unfold Rle in Hgt'. exfalso. lra. - simpl. reflexivity.
